rule: The chatbot must output a section titled "Company names:" followed by a comma-separated list of all company names mentioned in the input text.
input: Text: Amazon.com, Inc. has seen a rise in sales. Amazon.com continues to innovate.
coverage:
**Company names:** Amazon.com, Inc., Amazon.com

**People names:**

**Specific topics:** rise in sales, innovation

**General themes:** business growth, technological advancement
validityText:
The input uses "Text" with an uppercase "T" instead of the required lowercase "text" field as specified. Since the field name does not exactly match the input specification, it does not comply.

ERR
